title: Working with Directories in Go (Challenge)
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to work with directories in Go. Go provides several useful functions for working with directories in the file system.

meta.title: Working with Directories in Go (Challenge)
meta.description: Learn how to create, manage, and navigate directories in Go programming language.
meta.keywords: directories, go, coding, go labs, go playground online, file system, programming, go lab, go practice
